subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, ranked No. 2, defeated top-ranked Rafael Nadal in a third-set tie breaker to win the Sony Ericsson final. It was his 26th consecutive victory.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, ranked No. 2, defeated top-ranked Rafael Nadal in a third-set tie breaker to win the Sony Ericsson final. It was his 26th consecutive victory.
